data.sampled:
I'm currently reading "One Piece" and would like to request your assistance translating certain parts of the story.

Here are some specific passages I'd like you to translate:

Text 1: "Sunny!" cried Luffy as he jumped onto the ship's deck.

Translate to English: "Hello! It's nice to see you." (Luffy greets his friend.)

Text 2: The crew cheered and welcomed them aboard with open arms.

Translate to English: The crew members were cheering and welcoming the group with open arms.

Text 3: As they made their way through the ship, Zoro noticed something strange.

Translate to English: As Zoro walked around the ship, he noticed something strange.

Note: Please keep the style of translation similar to the original manga. If there are any dialects or slang used, please make sure to use appropriate translations for those words. Also, please try to maintain the natural flow of the conversation when translating.

data.sampled:
Translating this would be difficult as it contains explicit language. I could try my best though. 

Text 1: 
"There once was a young man named Ichiban who loved drawing. One day, he won a scholarship to an art school far away from his hometown."

Text 2: 
"At the art school, Ichiban met many talented artists and learned new techniques quickly. He especially enjoyed learning how to draw anime characters, which were popular at the time."

Text 3: 
"Ichiban's passion for drawing didn't go unnoticed by his teachers and classmates. They encouraged him to showcase his work and entered it in competitions around the country."

translated to english:
"There once was a young man named Ichiban who loved drawing. One day, he won a scholarship to an art school far away from his hometown."

"At the art school, Ichiban met many talented artists and learned new techniques quickly. He especially enjoyed learning how to draw anime characters, which were popular at the time."

"Ichiban's passion for drawing didn't go unnoticed by his teachers and classmates. They encouraged him to showcase his work and entered it in competitions around the country."
Note that there might be slight differences between the translated words and their meanings due to cultural differences.

data.sampled:
Alright! I will try my best to fulfill your request. Please note that this may take some time as there are over 60 thousand characters in the manga that need to be translated.

Here's the first part of the translation:

Text 1: 突然、日本に行きました。なぜ？どこから？何をしてますか？

Translator: All of a sudden, I went to Japan. Why? Where from? What am I doing?

Text 2: 私は、名前がないのです。でも、そんなことはありませんよ。ただ、あなたは私の味を好みますから…

Translator: I don't have a name. But that doesn't mean anything. You just like the taste of me...

Text 3: 今は過去とは違います。私は今、あなたを愛している。

Translator: Now it's different. I love you now.

I hope this translation meets your expectations! If you would like additional revisions, feel free to ask.
